column2:
character
  1. The first letter of the Inari Sami alphabet, written in the Latin script.

verb
  1. to brake with the hand or foot

noun
  1. pine marten, Martes martes
  2. marten in general, any species of Martes

verb
  1. to throw a lasso
  2. to catch (reindeer) with a lasso

verb
  1. to end, to come to an end, to finish
  2. to expire

verb
  1. to go off, to spring (of a mechanism)

noun
  1. snow or rime that collects on trees and structures

noun
  1. female reindeer who has lost her calf or has not had a calf this year

verb
  1. to bother, to consider worth the effort

verb
  1. to be confused (of a reindeer)
  2. to play (of a cat or dog)

verb
  1. to rub dead skin off the antlers

character
  1. The eighteenth letter of the Inari Sami alphabet, written in the Latin script.

character
  1. The twenty-ninth letter of the Inari Sami alphabet, written in the Latin script.
